section.p: Cross off the 250 Shards. The priestess steps over to you and fixes you with a mad, staring glare. You sink into a trance during which you experience a vision.

Note down this paragraph number. Now you can turn to any paragraph at random in any book in the Fabled Lands series that you like, and
read any sequence of up to six paragraphs , thus finding out what lies in store for you. What you find may not make any sense to you - well, such is the nature of oracles.
When you are finished, turn back to this paragraph, where you will come out of your trance.
The priestess bids you farewell with a cryptic, 'Until we meet again.'
